summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before the grand jury on August 20, 2019, and to produce all materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The subpoena includes a rider detailing the recipient's rights and instructions for document production.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena demands production of all materials relating to him, indicating he is the central subject of the grand jury investigation.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is issuing a subpoena to gather evidence for a grand jury investigation into Epstein.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The unnamed subpoena recipient is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on August 15, 2019, for an appearance on August 20, 2019, indicating active federal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein in the Southern District of New York.
The subpoena demands production of 'All materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein,' including text messages, emails, social media messages, documents, and notes.
The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Geoffrey S. Berman, confirming the Department of Justice's involvement in the investigation.

The subpoena references alleged violations of federal statutes 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (destruction, alteration, or falsification of records in federal investigations).
The recipient of the subpoena is not named in the provided text, indicating the document is likely a template or the recipient's name is on a separate page.
